commitResults.messageBody: Added the base functionality per week 1 + tag to the project.

commitResults.messageTitle: Implement input management and exit prompt
commitResults.messageBody: Created a taskManager() to handle the input prompt from the user, and added a Scanner function for input itself from the user. Using input "bye" from the user will stop the program via the while loop utilizing isRunning boolean.

added the functionality to add new prompts to a list, as well as the ability to list items via taskManager().

Future functionality would be to not include blank lines in the item list.

From previous input, created a method to handle blank input, and implemented markDone and unmarkDone for tasks in the Bruce program.

Future functionality would be to push for an response if task already has been marked done or undone.
Quick update to recognize the isCompleted in outputInterface to match the assignemts'.

commitResults.messageTitle: ABbstract and implement views and new Task classes
commitResults.messageBody:
Updated the abstraction for a MVC (model view controller) to make it easier to understand and navigate.

Implemented new Task classes and methods to handle these accordingly to Deadlines and Events and reflect in the UI.

commitResults.messageTitle: Further abstraction and improve code readability
commitResults.messageBody:
adjustments to abstraction lvls in the code, now it's seperated fully by MVC principle so far to make it easier for future development and abstraction according to instructions, now running instances passed to controller fr MV. Modified certain naming of methods and variables to fit conventions.

Future version, maybe add switch cases /enums to switch between taskManagement states?

adjustments to variables and naming conventions.

Future version, maybe add switch cases /enums to switch between taskManagement states?

adjustments to visibility, package-private -> public for static variables.

Future version, maybe add switch cases /enums to switch between taskManagement states?

commitResults.messageTitle: Implement PR log comments from peers
commitResults.messageBody: Implemented bug fix for program still printing "Event" or "deadline" in the task descriptions, changed Controller to switch cases (lamda) for easier readability, changed variable names (taskcounter). added range check as seperate method for easier readability in model.

commitResults.messageTitle: add A-packaging, implement exception handling and code-A-standard
commitResults.messageBody: Implemented bug fixes, error handling for all task versions so far, also logic for this. Future work needs to be done in the error handling, also abstraction and interfacing of the task model. Right now 1 parent, 3 children.

commitResults.messageTitle: add A-packaging and refactoring of Task Variants
commitResults.messageBody: Changed the packaging conventions for the project to fit better A-Code quality.
